item.description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT VEGA HAS CANCELLED HIS APPEARANCE TONIGHT IN HARTFORD. The event at Up or On the Rocks is not happening.

 

To try and salvage tonights meetup we will have a debate watching party at N.E. Pizza. Debate starts at 8 and goes to 9:30, and after we may continue with an evening sign-related event. Sorry for the short notice but we were thrown this wrench at the 11th hour and are making the best of it.
item.name: Debate watching Party at New England Pizza
